data.author: Peter Pach

changelog.release_notes:
v0.24 - 2016.10.25
- settings : option to swap day/month
- rebuild date function - now it's really nice
- fix : am hide option didn't worked before, I messed up, and even leave "true" in one of if's... wow
v0.23 - settings : added settings reset option, added option to hide leading zero at front of hour and/or date, option to hide "AM"
v0.22 - battery life / settings update improved, added option to hide seconds and improve battery life even further, added option to make hour display much larger, previous settings will be deleted
change the way how images are drawn (not using .png anymore) (app size - was 35KB, now 18KB), settings : battery display style, watchface will load quicker now, moved bluetooth icon
v0.15 - first public release, settings disabled due lack of previous tests, all basic features should be ready

data.description:
Digital watch face designed to look similar to Casio LCD watches.

Except the actual time this watch face provides date and name of the day. It also supports various settings.

Is there some option that you are really missing ? You like my watch face and have an idea to improve it ? Feel free to contact me !

latest_release.release_notes:
v0.24 - 2016.10.25
- settings : option to swap day/month
- rebuild date function - now it's really nice
- fix : am hide option didn't worked before, I messed up, and even leave "true" in one of if's... wow

data.title: Peter's Casio Digital
